Sql.query: select '"'||TO_CHAR(fecha,'dd/MM/yyyy HH24:mi:ss')||'","'||VALUE||'",0' VALUE,TO_CHAR(fecha,'HH24:mi:ss') FECHAHORA,null COLUMN_H, VALUE as frecuencia, TO_CHAR(fecha,'dd/MM/yyyy') as FECHA, TO_CHAR(fecha,'HH24:mi:ss') HORA from (select to_date( to_char(FECHAHORA, 'dd/MM/yyyy HH24:mi') || decode(length(SEC), 2, replace(SEC, 'H', ':0'), replace(SEC, 'H', ':')), 'dd/MM/yyyy HH24:mi:ss') as FECHA, VALUE from( SELECT FECHAHORA,NVL(TO_CHAR(H0, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H0, NVL(TO_CHAR(H1, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H1, NVL(TO_CHAR(H2, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H2, NVL(TO_CHAR(H3, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H3, NVL(TO_CHAR(H4, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H4, NVL(TO_CHAR(H5, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H5, NVL(TO_CHAR(H6, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H6, NVL(TO_CHAR(H7, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H7, NVL(TO_CHAR(H8, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H8, NVL(TO_CHAR(H9, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H9, NVL(TO_CHAR(H10, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H10, NVL(TO_CHAR(H11, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H11, NVL(TO_CHAR(H12, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H12, NVL(TO_CHAR(H13, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H13, NVL(TO_CHAR(H14, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H14, NVL(TO_CHAR(H15, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H15, NVL(TO_CHAR(H16, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H16, NVL(TO_CHAR(H17, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H17, NVL(TO_CHAR(H18, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H18, NVL(TO_CHAR(H19, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H19, NVL(TO_CHAR(H20, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H20, NVL(TO_CHAR(H21, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H21, NVL(TO_CHAR(H22, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H22, NVL(TO_CHAR(H23, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H23, NVL(TO_CHAR(H24, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H24, NVL(TO_CHAR(H25, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H25, NVL(TO_CHAR(H26, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H26, NVL(TO_CHAR(H27, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H27, NVL(TO_CHAR(H28, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H28, NVL(TO_CHAR(H29, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H29, NVL(TO_CHAR(H30, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H30, NVL(TO_CHAR(H31, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H31, NVL(TO_CHAR(H32, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H32, NVL(TO_CHAR(H33, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H33, NVL(TO_CHAR(H34, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H34, NVL(TO_CHAR(H35, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H35, NVL(TO_CHAR(H36, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H36, NVL(TO_CHAR(H37, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H37, NVL(TO_CHAR(H38, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H38, NVL(TO_CHAR(H39, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H39, NVL(TO_CHAR(H40, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H40, NVL(TO_CHAR(H41, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H41, NVL(TO_CHAR(H42, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H42, NVL(TO_CHAR(H43, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H43, NVL(TO_CHAR(H44, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H44, NVL(TO_CHAR(H45, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H45, NVL(TO_CHAR(H46, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H46, NVL(TO_CHAR(H47, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H47, NVL(TO_CHAR(H48, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H48, NVL(TO_CHAR(H49, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H49, NVL(TO_CHAR(H50, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H50, NVL(TO_CHAR(H51, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H51, NVL(TO_CHAR(H52, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H52, NVL(TO_CHAR(H53, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H53, NVL(TO_CHAR(H54, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H54, NVL(TO_CHAR(H55, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H55, NVL(TO_CHAR(H56, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H56, NVL(TO_CHAR(H57, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H57, NVL(TO_CHAR(H58, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H58, NVL(TO_CHAR(H59, 'FM999999999.999'), 'null') AS H59 FROM sic.F_LECTURA WHERE GPSCODI = {0} AND FECHAHORA BETWEEN TRUNC(to_date('{1}', 'dd/MM/yyyy HH24:Mi:ss'), 'MI') AND TRUNC(to_date('{2}', 'dd/MM/yyyy HH24:Mi:ss'), 'MI') ORDER BY FECHAHORA) unpivot( value for SEC in (H0, H1, H2, H3, H4, H5, H6, H7, H8, H9, H10, H11, H12, H13, H14, H15, H16, H17, H18, H19, H20, H21, H22, H23, H24, H25, H26, H27, H28, H29, H30, H31, H32, H33, H34, H35, H36, H37, H38, H39, H40, H41, H42, H43, H44, H45, H46, H47, H48, H49, H50, H51, H52, H53, H54, H55, H56, H57, H58, H59))) WHERE FECHA BETWEEN to_date('{1}', 'dd/MM/yyyy HH24:Mi:ss') AND to_date('{2}', 'dd/MM/yyyy HH24:Mi:ss')

select TO_CHAR(fechahora,'dd/MM/yyyy HH24:mi:ss') as fechahora, gpscodi, vsf, maximo, minimo, voltaje, num, desv, devsec, h0 FROM sic.F_LECTURA WHERE GPSCODI = {0} AND FECHAHORA BETWEEN TRUNC(to_date('{1}', 'dd/MM/yyyy HH24:Mi:ss'), 'MI') AND TRUNC(to_date('{2}', 'dd/MM/yyyy HH24:Mi:ss'), 'MI') ORDER BY fechahora ASC
SELECT GPSCODI FROM sic.F_LECTURA WHERE FECHAHORA BETWEEN to_date('{0}', 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND to_date('{1}', 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') GROUP BY GPSCODI;

select gps.gpscodi,gps.nombre,gps.gpsoficial from sic.me_gps gps WHERE exists (select 1 from sic.f_lectura a where a.fechahora between to_date('{0}', 'dd/MM/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') and to_date('{1}', 'dd/MM/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') and a.gpscodi=gps.gpscodi) AND ({2} = 0 or gps.GPSCODI={2}) and (nvl('{3}','X')='X' or gps.GPSOFICIAL='{3}')

select * from (select to_date( to_char(FECHAHORA, 'dd/MM/yyyy HH24:mi') || decode(length(SEC), 2, replace(SEC, 'H', ':0'), replace(SEC, 'H', ':')), 'dd/MM/yyyy HH24:mi:ss') as FECHA, VALUE,VOLTAJE from( SELECT FECHAHORA,VOLTAJE, H0, H1, H2, H3, H4, H5, H6, H7, H8, H9, H10,H11, H12, H13, H14, H15, H16, H17, H18, H19, H20, H21, H22, H23, H24, H25, H26, H27, H28, H29, H30,H31, H32, H33, H34, H35, H36, H37, H38, H39, H40, H41, H42, H43, H44, H45, H46, H47, H48, H49, H50,H51, H52, H53, H54, H55, H56, H57, H58, H59 FROM sic.F_LECTURA where FECHAHORA between to_date('{0}', 'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:mi') and to_date('{1}', 'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:mi') and gpscodi={2} ORDER BY FECHAHORA) unpivot( value for SEC in (H0, H1, H2, H3, H4, H5, H6, H7, H8, H9, H10,H11, H12, H13, H14, H15, H16, H17, H18, H19, H20, H21, H22, H23, H24, H25, H26, H27, H28, H29, H30, H31, H32, H33, H34, H35, H36, H37, H38, H39, H40, H41, H42, H43, H44, H45, H46, H47, H48, H49, H50, H51, H52, H53, H54, H55, H56, H57, H58, H59))) where FECHA between to_date('{3}', 'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:mi:ss') and to_date('{4}', 'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:mi:ss')

with a as(select to_date( to_char(FECHAHORA, 'dd/MM/yyyy HH24:mi') || decode(length(SEC), 2, replace(SEC, 'H', ':0'), replace(SEC, 'H', ':')), 'dd/MM/yyyy HH24:mi:ss') as FECHA ,value from( SELECT FECHAHORA,VOLTAJE,gpscodi, H0, H1, H2, H3, H4, H5, H6, H7, H8, H9, H10,H11, H12, H13, H14, H15, H16, H17, H18, H19, H20, H21, H22, H23, H24, H25, H26, H27, H28, H29, H30,H31, H32, H33, H34, H35, H36, H37, H38, H39, H40, H41, H42, H43, H44, H45, H46, H47, H48, H49, H50,H51, H52, H53, H54, H55, H56, H57, H58, H59 FROM sic.F_LECTURA where FECHAHORA between to_date('{0}', 'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:mi') and to_date('{1}', 'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:mi') and gpscodi={2} ORDER BY FECHAHORA) unpivot( value for SEC in (H0, H1, H2, H3, H4, H5, H6, H7, H8, H9, H10,H11, H12, H13, H14, H15, H16, H17, H18, H19, H20, H21, H22, H23, H24, H25, H26, H27, H28, H29, H30, H31, H32, H33, H34, H35, H36, H37, H38, H39, H40, H41, H42, H43, H44, H45, H46, H47, H48, H49, H50, H51, H52, H53, H54, H55, H56, H57, H58, H59))), b as (SELECT 'FMAX' Tipo, a.* FROM a ORDER BY value desc FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY ), c as (SELECT 'FMIN' Tipo, a.* FROM a ORDER BY value asc FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY ), d as (select min(fechahora)mi,max(fechahora) ma, count(1)c from ( SELECT to_date('{0}', 'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:mi') +(LEVEL - 1) / (24 * 60) AS fechahora FROM dual CONNECT BY to_date('{1}', 'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:mi') > to_date('{0}', 'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:mi') +(LEVEL - 1) / (24 * 60) MINUS SELECT t.fechahora as minutos_faltantes FROM sic.f_lectura t WHERE FECHAHORA between to_date('{0}', 'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:mi') and to_date('{1}', 'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:mi') and gpscodi={2}))
SELECT 'FALI' Tipo,mi,c from d where mi is not null union all SELECT 'FALF' Tipo,ma,c from d where ma is not null union all SELECT * from b union all SELECT * from c union all select decode(INDICCODI,'U','TSUB','O','TSOS'), FECHAHORA,INDICVALOR from sic.F_INDICADOR_FREC where INDICCODI in ('U','O') and FECHAHORA between to_date('{0}', 'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:mi') and to_date('{1}', 'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:mi') and GPS={2}

SELECT fechahora, H0,VOLTAJE FROM SIC.F_LECTURA where FECHAHORA between to_date('{0}', 'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:mi') and to_date('{1}', 'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:mi') and gpscodi={2} and MOD(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(fechahora, 'MI')), {3}) = 0

SELECT '1'R, GPSOSINERG, GPS, TO_CHAR(U)U, TO_CHAR(O1)O1, TO_CHAR(O2)O2, null a FROM ( SELECT max(GPSOSINERG)GPSOSINERG, GPS, CASE WHEN INDICCODI = 'U' THEN 'U' WHEN INDICCODI = 'O' AND INDICVALOR > 1 THEN 'O2' ELSE 'O1' END AS INDICCODI, COUNT(1) AS TOTAL FROM sic.F_INDICADOR_FREC left join sic.me_gps gps on GPS=gpscodi WHERE INDICCODI IN ('U', 'O') AND FECHAHORA>=to_date('{0}', 'dd/mm/yyyy') and FECHAHORA < to_date('{1}', 'dd/mm/yyyy') GROUP BY GPS, CASE WHEN INDICCODI = 'U' THEN 'U' WHEN INDICCODI = 'O' AND INDICVALOR > 1 THEN 'O2' ELSE 'O1' END ) PIVOT ( SUM(TOTAL) FOR INDICCODI IN ('U' AS U, 'O1' AS O1, 'O2' AS O2) ) UNION ALL -- Nueva consulta unida al final SELECT '1' AS R, GPSOSINERG, GPS, NULL AS U, NULL AS O1, NULL AS O2, NULL AS a FROM ( SELECT GPSOSINERG, GPSCODI AS GPS FROM sic.me_gps WHERE GPSOFICIAL = 'S' ) union all select '2', 'GPS '|| gps.nombre , gps.gpscodi, null, null, null, null from sic.me_gps gps where gps.gpsestado='A' and gps.gpscodi not in (select distinct gps from sic.F_INDICADOR_FREC where FECHAHORA>=to_date('{0}', 'dd/mm/yyyy') and FECHAHORA < to_date('{1}', 'dd/mm/yyyy') and INDICCODI IN ('U', 'O')) union all select '2', 'GPS '||nombre||' ('||GPSOSINERG||')'NOMBRE, GPS,INDICCODI, TO_CHAR(FECHAHORA,'dd/mm/yyyy')fecha, CASE WHEN INDICCODI = 'O' THEN TO_CHAR(FECHAHORA - INTERVAL '15' MINUTE + INTERVAL '1' SECOND, 'HH24:MI:SS') || ' - ' || TO_CHAR(FECHAHORA, 'HH24:MI:SS') WHEN INDICCODI = 'U' THEN TO_CHAR(FECHAHORA, 'HH24:MI:SS') || ' - ' || TO_CHAR(FECHAHORA + INTERVAL '59' SECOND, 'HH24:MI:SS') ELSE TO_CHAR(FECHAHORA, 'HH24:MI:SS') END AS HORA, to_char(INDICVALOR, '99999.9999') from sic.F_INDICADOR_FREC left join sic.me_gps gps on GPS=gpscodi where INDICCODI in ('U','O') and FECHAHORA>=to_date('{0}', 'dd/mm/yyyy') and FECHAHORA < to_date('{1}', 'dd/mm/yyyy') order by 1,3,4,5,6
